      • getExactOrder

        public Order getExactOrder(java.sql.Connection connection,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String product,
                           java.lang.Double sum,
                           int quantity)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method gets an order based on the Client name, Product name, amount to pay and quantity
        Parameters:
        connection - - Data Base Connection
        name - - The name of the client that ordered
        product - - The name of the product the client ordered
        sum - - The sum the client has to pay for the order
        quantity - - The quantity ordered by the client
        Returns:
        The order that satisfies these parameters

        java.sql.SQLException
